title: 3D Printed Smart Lamp System
shortDescription: Custom IoT lamp with 3D printed housing and browser extension control.
longDescription: A complete smart lighting solution featuring custom 3D printed lamp housing, ESP8266 microcontroller, and a Chrome Browser app. The system allows for webcam status control, indicating when the user is "On-Air".
